Type.BattleDialog: Is this the Library? It’s as strange as the others said.
Let’s see… Are you gonna be my opponent?
There’s no need to hurry. Let’s take our time to get started.
Hm, this might prove to be useful intel.
Hah, so this is a Star of the City, huh… It’s no pushover…
It can be inconvenient at times, but I still prefer to take care of things on my own.
This might get tricky… Time to get a bit more serious.
This is gonna end soon. Let’s chop the rest of this up now.
…I think I’ve seen that move before somewhere.
These guys are more interesting than I thought…
